message.content: {"given_definition_quality":68,"better_definition":"how many; a few","sentence":"几个学生坐在桌子上。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style scene showing three students sitting together at a table. The environment around them gently crumbles or fades, evoking an end-of-the-world atmosphere, yet the students are calm and focused. Subtle light and muted colors create a gentle, surreal feel. The number of students is clearly visible, emphasizing the meaning of '几'.","sentence_translation":"A few students are sitting at the table."}
